alert.note: Alert for Grayson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 3:55PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Ashe and southwestern Grayson Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 355 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Flatwood, or near Whitetop, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Whitetop... Nella... and Flatwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
